subtitle: AniHistory reads your anime list from your AniList profile and creates a timeline to visualize your watch history.

chart.disclaimer: Note: If the start and end dates for an entry are the same, 1 day is added to the end date so that it will display on the chart.

messages.refresh_directions: Press Refresh to refresh the page
messages.loading_disclaimer: It'll take a few seconds to load all your data, depending on how large your list is
messages.update_directions: Press the update button below to add user
messages.anilist_instructions: Click here to go to your list on anilist
